text: Altar of Dementia: Each player sacrifices 2 creatures and mills X cards where X is the creatures conbimed power
Grindstone: Each player mills 2 cards, if both cards are the same colour, repeat the process
The Raid Monster gains 15 life and removes 10 poison counters
Sands of Delirium: Each player mills {x*2} cards
Place {xp} 0/2 Ornithopters (flying) creature tokens in front of the Raid Monster
Grinding Station: Each player mills 3 cards
Tormod's Crypt: Exile each player's graveyard
Wheel of Fortune: Each player discards their hand and draws 7 cards
